alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead; Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 2:37PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Madison and central Beaverhead Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 236 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Dillon, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Beaverhead Rock State Park and Glen. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 55 and 90. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
